languages.text: "Ага, только я как-то слыхал, что он говорит... Мне хватило, чтобы больше никогда не вслушиваться в его шепот".

traits.locale_text: "Дело в содержании этих молитв, понимаешь? Я только отрывками слыхал, но вещи, о которых он говорит... Мне хватило, чтобы больше никогда не вслушиваться в его шепот по ночам".

languages.text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."
languages.original_text: "Ага, только я как-то слыхал, что он говорит... Мне хватило, чтобы больше никогда не вслушиваться в его шепот".

traits.locale_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me to never listen in on his whispers again."
"Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me to never listen in on his whispers again."
"Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."
"Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."
"Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."
"Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."

languages.text: «Sí, pero una vez escuché lo que rezaba... Nunca más pienso intentar oír lo que susurra».
languages.original_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, pero una vez escuché lo que rezaba... Nunca más pienso intentar oír lo que susurra».

languages.text: 「ええ、一度聞いたある発言を除いてですが…あれはキツかった。二度と彼の囁きを聞きたくはありません」
languages.original_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、一度聞いたある発言を除いてですが…あれはキツかった。二度と彼の囁きを聞きたくはありません」

languages.text: “是啊，但有一次，我不小心听到了他的祷告……内容真的很让人崩溃，我再也不敢偷听他自言自语了。”
languages.original_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，但有一次，我不小心听到了他的祷告……内容真的很让人崩溃，我再也不敢偷听他自言自语了。”

languages.text: "Ja, nur als ich gehört habe, was er sagt ... Das hat mir gereicht. Ich werde seinem Flüstern nie wieder lauschen."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, nur als ich gehört habe, was er sagt ... Das hat mir gereicht. Ich werde seinem Flüstern nie wieder lauschen."

languages.text: « Ouais, sauf qu'une fois, j'ai écouté ce qu'il disait... C'est pas pour moi. Je veux plus jamais entendre ça. »
languages.original_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."

traits.locale_text: « Ouais, sauf qu'une fois, j'ai écouté ce qu'il disait... C'est pas pour moi. Je veux plus jamais entendre ça. »

languages.text: "Evet ama bir seferinde söylediği bir şeyi duymuştum... O bana yetti. Onun fısıltılarını tekrar dinlemeye niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: "Yeah, except I once heard what he was saying... It was enough for me. I'll never listen in on his whispers again."
